## Installation

Install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with: 

```{r, eval = FALSE}
devtools::install_github("MethodsConsultants/tibbletest")
```


## Usage

```{r}

library(tibbletest)

example_dat %>% 
  descriptives(treatment = "treat",
               variables = c("age", "sugar_factor", "gender", "happiness", "happy"))
```
